text: this is Simone Romero and Cali Colombia
Danny the Tiger used to be owned by a
commander in Colombia's paramilitary
death squads workers where he lived told
rescuers that the 500-pound tiger fed on
the flesh of the militias victims when
he first came here he was so aggressive
if anyone passed his cage he would throw
himself at them Lewis once belonged to a
drug trafficker in western Colombia for
some reason the drug lord had one of the
Cougars legs cut off both of these
animals were seized by authorities and
brought here to Vienna situated in a
Cali slum it's Columbia's largest
private animal refuge the refuge
currently cares for some 800 animals
funded by private donations
it's philosophies to accept any animal
no matter how mauled or infirm many are
grateful to be here like Jupiter the
lion saved from a circus Anna Julio
Torres founded the refuge a decade and a
half ago she works closely with police
who sees animals who were being
illegally traded okay
this place is very important for the
city of Cali and especially the
environmental police if it didn't exist
all these animals would have to be put
down Lulu the tiger was donated by a
circus completely blind she was no
longer useful for performing it's so sad
when she comes out to eat she gets lost
in her own cage Anna who Leah suspects
the blindness wasn't from natural causes
even though vlo Deniz situated in a
residential zone neighbors don't seem to
mind living just a wall away from
man-eating big cat
there's no problem the animals are all
locked up so they don't bother us at all
many of Colombia's drug lords don't mind
living near ferocious animals either
they housed them on their luxurious
ranches the late Pablo Escobar built his
own private zoo on his country estate
sem DiNapoli's years after his death his
estate was reopened as a theme park
where visitors can see some of the
descendants of the hippopotamus as he
had imported the traffickers like these
animals because it shows their power and
they can intimidate people these people
use these animals to carry out their
personal vendettas under such cruel
masters these animals often suffer some
traffickers used to drug this lion his
brain was destroyed he has a look as if
he was stoned it's an animal that was
fed a lot of drugs
humans are not content just to get high
they also give drugs to animals many
animals come to Violetta enough for
another chance to live but some
inevitably come here to die this is the
cemetery there are lions tigers monkeys
crocodiles in each hole there is an
animal buried we think it was a heart
attack
we gave him first-aid mouth-to-mouth but
we couldn't do anything
Malou 30 support page he was part of the
family he was here and now he's gone
these animals come to feel like my
children
